X.ii.3.C.3.a
.
Requirement for Sending Contempor-aneous Notices
Any notice of change or proposed change in benefits, including the contemporaneous notice, must be sent to the current address of record, or the most recent address, such as the most recent address in the corporate record, of the
beneficiary
beneficiary’s fiduciary (if applicable), and
beneficiary’s designated representative (if any).
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C - Contemporaneous Notice
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C
